about_the_game:
Finding a secluded corner in the quiet and intimate chambers of the library can release some desires that need to be fulfilled on the spot. It’s hard to say what exactly was Monique thinking when she reached for the book but now… Well, she has only one thing on her mind.

This PHOTO PACK contains:
- three new levels to beat
- three new photos to hack.

content_descriptors.notes: Nudity, Partial Nudity, Sexual Content, Sexual Themes

detailed_description:
Finding a secluded corner in the quiet and intimate chambers of the library can release some desires that need to be fulfilled on the spot. It’s hard to say what exactly was Monique thinking when she reached for the book but now… Well, she has only one thing on her mind.

This PHOTO PACK contains:
- three new levels to beat
- three new photos to hack.

fullgame.name: Cuties Hacked: Oh no someone stole my photos!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+
  • Processor: Intel i3 2100+ or AMD FX-4100+
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM, OpenGL 3.2+ compatible, nVidia GT 720+ or AMD HD 5450+ or Intel HD Graphics 5000+
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14
  • Graphics: 1024 MB VRAM, OpenGL 3.2+ compatible, nVidia GTX 750+ or AMD Radeon HD 7770M+ or Intel HD Graphics 5300+
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

  • Storage: 2 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 2100+ or AMD FX-4100+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM, nVidia GT 720+ or AMD HD 5450+ or Intel HD Graphics 5000+
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB VRAM, nVidia GTX 750+ or AMD Radeon HD 7770M+ or Intel HD Graphics 5300+
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
